channel.title: Hdparm on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Hdparm on purpleidea.com

item.title: scary man pages
item.description: while doing a little reading and research, i ended up reading a bit of the hdparm man page. never in my life have i read such a scary man page. i guess it is appropriate for halloween, but it came 2 days late in my case. as a result of my being so impressed with the sheer amount of warnings in the manual, i have decided to compile them here.
